name: Music Clicker
description:
An entry into the Blind Jam!

Nothing will ever be on the screen besides a short blurb reminding you to listen to instructions! The goal of the game is to help out an AI that lost all of the music they had. Giving them notes will allow them to unlock musical sounds, then songs. If you help the AI learn all the piano songs, don't fret, there's a drum that can use some help too!

This game is audio only.

If you ever forget an instruction, pressing the "i" key will give you a recap of all options.
